alert.note: Alert for Indian River; Martin; Southern Brevard County; St. Lucie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 24 at 1:43PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of St. Lucie, Indian River, Martin and southeastern Brevard Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 143 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Camp Holly Fish Camp to 11 miles east of Fort Drum to 8 miles east of Indiantown. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Port Saint Lucie, Palm Bay, Melbourne, Walton and Fort Pierce. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Indian River; Martin; Southern Brevard County; St. Lucie
